meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat tuberculosis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cycloserine to help fight the tuberculosis infection.
meanings.sent2: Cycloserine is an important medication for treating tuberculosis effectively.
meanings.sent3: When the bacteria saw cycloserine coming, they ran away like scaredy-cats!
meanings.sent4: The cycloserine worked like a brave knight, battling the tuberculosis bacteria in the body.
meanings.sent5: Taking cycloserine daily is like having a shield protecting you from tuberculosis.

meanings.definition: A medication that inhibits the synthesis of bacterial cell walls.
meanings.sent1: The cycloserine stops the bacteria from building their protective walls.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often use cycloserine to prevent bacteria from forming strong cell walls.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria tried to build a wall, but cycloserine said, 'Not on my watch!'
meanings.sent4: Cycloserine acts like a gatekeeper, blocking the construction of bacterial cell walls.
meanings.sent5: Imagine cycloserine as a wall-crushing superhero, breaking down bacterial defenses.
